description.value: The Character can attempt to guide a vessel through the Warp using the normal rules for doing so. However they cannot estimate the journey dduration (counting as failed by 1 DoF), and cannot locate the Astronomicon (suffering -20 to all tests to Navigate the Warp), finally they do not use Navigate(Warp) whenever required to do so, instead making Survival Tests.

system.benefit: The Character can attempt to guide a vessel through the Warp using the normal rules for doing so. However they cannot estimate the journey dduration (counting as failed by 1 DoF), and cannot locate the Astronomicon (suffering -20 to all tests to Navigate the Warp), finally they do not use Navigate(Warp) whenever required to do so, instead making Survival Tests.

prerequisites.text: Ork Weirdboy, Da Power of Waaagh!, Psyniscience +10

specialAbilities.name: Throo Da Kosmos
specialAbilities.description: The Character can attempt to guide a vessel through the Warp using the normal rules for doing so.
